articles.title: Death Toll Tops 1,000; Mortality Estimate at 1%: Virus Update
articles.description: The mortality rate from the coronavirus in China is estimated at 1%, according to a new report that attempts to account for mild cases as well as severe ones. The death toll from the outbreak climbed above 1,000.

articles.title: Treasury Inversion Is Not About the U.S., It Is About the Whole World
articles.description: What used to be a reliable American recession indicator is instead an barometer of investors diving for cover worldwide.
articles.content:
